activities: Ansell Healthcare Products LLC and its U.S. affiliates receive personal information in various forms relating to European personnel, including prospective and former employees of Ansell Ltd. and its subsidiaries. Data transferred from the European Union to the United States are used to carry out Ansell’s human resources functions and to support the human resources activities of the Ansell family of companies worldwide.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
